body: In addition, we can now set autolog and tab name colour settings for conferences - - - This change isâ€‚[](https://reviewable.io/reviews/TokTok/toxic/293)

comment_data.body: What will happen if this is an invalid public key? I guess "config error: failed to set conference tab name color"? I wonder if the `PUBLIC_KEY_1` should be some valid (but non-existent) public key like `AAAAAA...` or `CAFEBABEDEADBEEFFEEDB00B`?

It'll give the same stderr warning whether it's a fake public key, a random name, or a real public key that isn't found in your profile.

Edit: well, actually an invalid pk will give a slightly different stderr message. But it won't break profile loading.
Alright, i put some fake keys in the example config so error messages will be more explanatory.
Also I think in a different commit I'll make those errors more clear, so you can determine if the problem is an invalid pk or something else.

for conferences
